browser_narrative.complexity_income: Kazakhstan is less complex than expected for its income level.
browser_narrative.eci_rank_change: Kazakhstan's economy has become more complex, improving 26 positions in the ECI ranking.
browser_narrative.complexity_driver: Kazakhstan's improving complexity has occurred despite the stagnant diversification of its exports, potentially risking the sustainability of its gains in complexity.
browser_narrative.growth_projection: Kazakhstan is projected to grow moderately. 3.9% annually, ranking in the top quartile of countries globally.
browser_narrative.opportunities: Kazakhstan is positioned to take advantage of a moderate number of opportunities to diversify its production using its existing knowhow.
